comment.author: 27000124@N05
comment._content:
This is an M60A1 tank. They started building these in 1962 so it is a Vietnam era tank although it was not used in Vietnam. The emblem on the searchlight cover may be for the 40th Armor Regiment.
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/us_army_rolling_along/6957626377/]

comment.author: 27000124@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/90606492@N04/] The M46, M47, M48 and M60 were all known as "Patton" Tanks.
